attributes.additional_details: Housing development to the North of Fareham.  Too many houses 6,000 the size of Petersfield, which will results in an adverse amount of vehicles for the infra structure and road network to cope with. Roads involved A32 towards Wickham, A32 towards Gosport.  M27 Towards Bournemouth and towards Portsmouth.  A27 in both directions. Wickham town and central Fareham roads will become blocked and will put all the local roads under undue pressure and will spiral out wards.
